Iterate over the years 2002-2023 and read each yearly CSV (water-body-testing-<year>.csv).
Filter for rows where the column 'Beach Type Description' equals 'Marine'.
FIlter for rows where the column 'Violation' value (lower-case/normalized) is 'yes'.
Compute the exceedance rate as (number of violation rows) divided by (total marine rows) for each year.
Take the mean of the yearly rates after filtering to obtain the overall average rate for 2002-2023.
